content: crochet baby beanie size finished circumference 13 ½ gauge 6 stitches and 5 row = 2 inches in double_crochet materials h hook worsted weight yarn tapestry needle pattern chain 4 join with slip_stitch to form a ring round 1 chain 2 counts as first double_crochet 9 double_crochet in ring join with slip_stitch to top of beg double_crochet 10 double_crochet round 2 chain 2 double_crochet in same st 2dc in next st and in every st around join 20 double_crochet round 3 chain 2 2 double_crochet in next st *double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet in next repeat from* join 30dc round 4 chain 2 double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet in next st *double_crochet in next 2 st 2 double_crochet in next st repeat from* join 40 round 5-11 chain 2 double_crochet in every st around join 40dc round 12 chain 1 half_double_crochet in every st around join 40 half_double_crochet alternative ending round 11 chain 2 *double_crochet in next 12 sts 2 double_crochet in next st repeat from * twice double_crochet in each st to the end join 43 double_crochet round 12 chain 1 single_crochet in same st *skip 2 sts 5 double_crochet in next st skip next 2 sts single_crochet in next st repeat from* join finish off flower round 1 with center color chain 3 and join with slip_stitch to form a loop 12 single_crochet in loop finish off leaving a long tail to sew onto hat round 2 switch to petal color join to center with a slip_stitch *chain 15 slip_stitch in same st slip_stitch in next st and repeat from* join and finish off i want to say thanks to raisingolives for her alternative ending to the hat © stacey jesso
